name: ZMC Visual Tablet Data
summary: Learn about .EKB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: VisualTablet is designed to maximize the workspace of the user by hiding elements like toolboxes when not in use.

description: Application data used by VisualTablet, a plug-in for AutoCAD that adds a Graphical User Interface designed to enhance the productivity of digitizer template users; contains the necessary data to run the application.
